html:
1.30.18  3:20 pm   Hi Bill, a genuine question about your "history of the entire world, i guess" video. At about 4:36 (https://youtu.be/xuCn8ux2gbs?t=276) you mention that the humans started using metal, but not what specific type of metal was used. Do you know what the metal that was used exactly was?

     copper

1.30.18  3:04 pm   What is your moral alignment

     can't say, don't wanna jinx it

1.30.18  2:11 pm   why are you so good at life?

     i think i saved my points from the previous round! i can't figure out how to access them, but they appear to be saved, some how

1.30.18  1:58 pm   do you have like a box full of ideas under your bed or something? You sure got a LOT of them...

     it's a basket, and it's on a shelf. no, there's actually 2 baskets. oh wait, no, they are multiplying

1.30.18  1:57 pm   how do you have the time 2 do so much things

     my question is, why don't i have more time to do more things

1.30.18  1:51 pm   What's your real name?

     i have it written down some where

1.30.18  1:45 pm   You sound like you are tripping in your reality videos.

     it sounds like you may be tripping while you're listening to them

1.30.18  1:31 pm   Why are some card games completely luck based?

     so you can still play them if you have no brain, or if you are waiting for yours to come back from the repair shop

1.30.18  1:02 pm   who do you think will win the super bowl

     the NFL

1.30.18  12:24 pm   how to english

     so far you're doing great

1.30.18  11:55 am   Will society ever be perfect?

     maybe better

1.30.18  10:22 am   Do you have a method to forgetting things that are very difficult to leave behind?

     experience many new things

1.30.18  8:48 am   OMG!!! FUCKIN CHORDS!!!!

     ah, that's true

1.30.18  8:45 am   Have you ever gotten any offers from any major studios?

     yes

1.30.18  8:28 am   Are you still harmonizing the weather lady?

     no

1.30.18  6:15 am   i think finding the mountain is usually more difficult than climbing it, even if it seems like it should be the other way around. do you think so too?

     it depends on the size of the mountain, and how well hidden it is

1.30.18  5:55 am   Have you ever heard a song that makes you pause and think of how awesome humanity is, and somehow give you hope for the future?

     yes

1.30.18  5:54 am   My theater teacher always said you've won the world when you can make other people have feelings over your work. What do you think?

     that sounds about right

1.30.18  1:53 am   What color pen is the most productive

     whatever is in the strongest contrast with the color of the page

1.30.18  1:46 am   What should I name my child

     childy

1.30.18  1:43 am   science is boring

     you are science

1.30.18  1:39 am   Was (or is) there ever a point that you wanted to change your music style or make serious videos

     all my videos are serious

      or just wanted to change something? if so how.

     one of the main things i've always been trying to change is to be able to do more good work faster

1.30.18  1:16 am   how do we know you're not writing the questions?

     you can't know for sure

1.30.18  1:10 am   Is there a way for me to give you money?

     yes

1.30.18  1:05 am   If you ever get the chance to go to the Moon, what would you do there?

     play with some rocks i guess. i think there's rocks up there

1.30.18  12:23 am   you seem to answer a lot of questions. don't you ever take a good long break from answering them?

     if i go more than a day, people start freaking the hell out. like they have been today

1.30.18  12:20 am   What do you think about lip syncing for music video production vs. live stage performances?

     there are advantages and disadvantages to each. but usually if someone does a concert video from a real concert, there is a 99.9% chance they took the opportunity to at least fix a couple things in the audio before releasing it. simply because it's possible

1.30.18  12:12 am   Do you record each instrument separately or do you sing and play at the same time 

     i sing and play every instrument simultaneously whilst also uploading the video straight to buzz feed dot com

1.29.18  10:48 pm   Did you write la de da in 2008? Thank you for bringing it to life. It gave me life.

     the first verse and pre-chorus was written in early 2009. the part that goes 'la de da' was written in september 2012. and the rest of the song was written in october 2017

1.29.18  10:47 pm   You mentioned a suidice page to an earlier question. Where can we find that page? A weblink please?

     i have no idea what you're talking about

1.29.18  10:44 pm   Is it difficult trying to come with an answer or a response for any possible thing anyone on the internet can send to you through this question box? 

     yes but i get a lot of practice

1.29.18  10:36 pm   How often are you working on content?

     all the time, every day

     Do you often have many other things to do in the background?

     only things related to bill wurtz dot com, and the bill wurtz brand

1.29.18  10:24 pm   Why are your answers sarcastic?

     why are your questions accusatory

1.29.18  10:13 pm   Do you think you're weird and people misunderstand the way you do things or do you think you aren't weird at all and people understand you all the time?

     can you give me more options to choose from, neither of those sound quite right

1.29.18  10:09 pm   really loved your la de da song. can you keep making songs?

     yes

1.29.18  9:31 pm   is there original anything left to be said?

     sure

1.29.18  9:22 pm   What's something that you've learned that feels important to you? 

     everyone has been each other

1.29.18  9:02 pm   Could you please upload your songs in a higher quality file format, such as .flac?

     that doesn't seem necessary

1.29.18  7:58 pm   so bill, your tellin me you write songs, then get real stressed about writing songs, then you use that as a gateway, to write even more songs?

     that sounds familiar, but there is more to it than that

1.29.18  7:36 pm   Why don't you add all of your tweets to the "notebook" section?

     because some of them were really composed just for twitter

1.29.18  6:57 pm   How is this question page so much better than the YouTube comment section?

     one reason is that nothing gets posted here without my approval. another reason is because i get to pick the colour scheme. there are many other reasons which i can't say at this time

1.29.18  6:51 pm   WHY HAVENT YOU ANSWERED ANY QUESTIONS TODAY SHOULD I BE WORRIED 

     trying to finish the video

1.29.18  5:47 pm   Why are your videos so surreal?

     to keep it interesting

1.29.18  5:32 pm   how many questions have you been asked as of this question?

     i'm not sure but it's at least 60,000. probably much more

1.29.18  5:09 pm   Why is that like this?

     it might be

1.29.18  5:09 pm   why are you so mean?

      8.6.17  12:55 am

1.29.18  4:39 pm   Best year so far?

     every year is better (and worse) than the previous

1.29.18  4:34 pm   how did you feel when vine announced it was shutting down,

     glad that i had fully transitioned away from it, a year before

     did this feel like you could focus more on music videos like 'outside' and longer vine like videos like 'soap tips' or did you feel like you would miss the shorter style of videos. 

     i had already transitioned away from vine a year before

1.29.18  4:19 pm   how long have you been on your current path of ruthlessly making as much content as humanly possible

     about 4 years, but for many years before that i was ruthlessly preparing to be on that path

1.29.18  4:15 pm   How do I avoid being eaten by dragons?

     eat the dragons first
